fields.name: The Treachery of Zorag
fields.description: Rumors tell of a powerful wizard about to awaken from an eternal slumber in a nearby kingdom. A knight is recruiting heroes to investigate the threat.
fields.intro_text:
While milling about the Hall of the Guild of Free Adventurers, you hear a loud rapping sound that draws everyone's attention to a Knight from the nearby city of Behlos. He clears his throat and begins to speak, "I will not waste your time. We have all seen the rise of a 2nd moon, blood red, that foretells the rise of an ancient power. You know of what I speak." He pauses for a moment, the room silent as a tomb, and continues.

"Zorag."

There is a collective gasp in the Hall. You have heard the legends of a powerful wizard who continuously sought greater power by unnatural means and was eventually imprisoned by a benevolent order of Druids. Unfortunately, the order faded over time and the magic that held Zorag in captivity waned. Rumors circulated for years that he was free and was drawing all power and evil to him, but many dismissed this as mere speculation. Some didn't even believe he really existed. Most believed he had died while being held by the Druids.

The Knight continues, "King Raulos is assembling a party of this land's greatest heroes to investigate the possibility of Zorag's return and defeat him if he has indeed returned. One of you must join this quest. Who is this Guild's greatest warrior?"

Without hesitation, everyone turns and points to you! Some yell out, "{{name}}!" with excitement and others say it with relief that they will not be burdened with this errand.

You step forward to the Knight and announce yourself. The Knight looks at you with doubt, and perhaps even a bit of fear. Finally, he says, "You have one day to gather your equipment and say goodbye to loved ones. You are to take the King's Road to Behlos and meet at the King's Hall at sunrise on the second day. To fail to appear or to be late will be considered treason to the realm, punishable by death. That is all."

With that, he briskly walks away.

fields.name: quest
Derek C. Jeter
You are at the terminus of King's Road.
fields.description: Here is where the well-traveled cobblestone road begins. To the south is a dirt path that leads home. A sign here with an arrow pointing east reads, "Behlos City" and the road disappears into the horizon in that direction.

fields.name: You are on King's Road.
fields.description: Here the King's Road rolls across the wilderness. The road runs east and west for miles.

fields.name: You are on King's Road.
fields.description: Here the King's Road rolls across the land. There are very few travelers on the road and the only signs of civilization are the occasional hut or inn. The road runs east and west for miles and miles.

fields.name: You are on King's Road.
fields.description: Here the King's Road rolls across the land, which is quite hilly. The road runs east and west for miles.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection on King's Road.
fields.description: There are rolling hills all about. A sign with an arrow pointing north reads, "Northmarch Road". Below it, a second sign with an arrow pointing east reads, "Behlos City". Northmarch Road, also cobblestone, is not nearly as well maintained as King's Road.

fields.name: You are on King's Road.
fields.description: Here the King's Road proceeds endlessly across the hilly land like a vast ribbon. The road runs east and west for miles.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection on King's Road.
fields.description: This intersection is at the peak of a high, rocky hill. A sign with an arrow pointing south reads, "Southport City". Below it, a second sign with an arrow pointing east reads, "Behlos City".

fields.name: You are on King's Road.
fields.description: Here the King's Road proceeds east and west. In the far distance to the east, you can barely make out the walls of Behlos City.

fields.name: You are on Southport Road.
fields.description: This wide road, paved with broad stones, is heavily traveled. It runs north and south for miles.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection on Southport Road.
fields.description: There is an old wooden sign here. An arrow pointing south says, "Southport City". Another arrow pointing east says, "Westwind Road". You can see wide, grassy plains in that direction.

fields.name: You are on Westwind Road.
fields.description: This country road winds through the grassy plains of this region, running east and west.

fields.name: You are at a bend on Westwind Road.
fields.description: Here the road makes a sharp bend running north and west. There are expansive grassy fields as far as the eye can see with only spartan trees and shrubbery making it difficult to find shade or shelter.

fields.name: You are on Westwind Road.
fields.description: This long country road meanders about the gorgeous meadows, dotted with flowers, that stretch on for miles. The road travels north and south.

fields.name: You are on King's Road.
fields.description: Here the road cuts through a rather rocky terrain making travel somewhat slower. Numerous road repairs indicate winter frost heave and shifting ground. You catch the slightest smell of saltwater wafting from the east. The road runs east and west.

fields.name: You are at the edge of Gull's Eye Cliffs.
fields.description: Here the road ends at the edge of a mammoth cliff. The sheer drop leads directly to the churning waters, known as The Dreamless Sea, below. To the south you can see the entrance to a cave. King's Road proceeds west.

fields.name: You are on Southport Road.
fields.description: This heavily traveled road runs north and south. You can faintly smell saltwater on the air.

fields.name: You are on Northmarch Road.
fields.description: This road is not very heavily travelled. Grass grows up between the cobblestones and many of them have been cracked, shifted out of position, or simply missing. The road stretches north and south for many miles.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: A dirt road runs east and west as far as the eye can see. Considering the overgowth, it would seem this road is infrequently used. An old wooden sign pointing south says, "Northmarch Road". A second arrow pointing east and west says, "Old Mountain Road".

fields.name: You are on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: This road stretches east and west for many miles. Far to the northeast you can see a massive mountain range - The Shadow Mountains.

fields.name: You are at a bend on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: Here the road makes a sharp turn to the north. There are very few travelers on this road and when you do see someone, they eye you with suspicion. To the north, the road rises up to meet the mountains. To the east the road rolls out into the wilderness.

fields.name: You are on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: Here the road steeply winds northward up the mountainside. The terrain is rocky and difficult and many stretches of the road are on treacherous ledges cut into the side of the mountain.

fields.name: You are at the Pass of Karathas on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: Here the road turns east to take advantage of a narrow pass through The Shadow Mountains. Far below you can barely make out the surrounding wilderness. There is some unusual stonework here cut into the mountainside.

fields.name: You are on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: This road proceeds west up the narrow rise into the mountains. To the east the road descends into the wilderness far below.

fields.name: You are at a bend on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: Here the road makes a gentle bend as it rolls across the countryside. The road proceeds north and west.

fields.name: You are on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: Here the road spans the vast wilderness. You can vaguely see The Shadow Mountains far to the west. The road runs north and south.

fields.name: You are at a bend on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: The road makes a gradual bend here, running south and east. Here the road is almost entirely devoid of travelers.

fields.name: You are on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: The road continues to roll across the vast wilderness here. To the far east, you can see a huge forest. The road runs east and west.

fields.name: You are at the edge of The Dead Forest.
fields.description: You see a dense, dark forest. The cobblestone road, which runs east and west, becomes a dirt path at the tree line. There is a small wooden sign here.

fields.name: You are on a path in The Dead Forest.
fields.description: This is a wide, stone-lined path that wanders through the forest. Although it is quite dark due to the density of the trees, you can still see clearly. You can hear the sounds of birds and small forest critters about.

fields.name: You are at a widening of the path in The Dead Forest.
fields.description: Here the path widens out into a small clearing. It is dead quiet here and seems much more shaded than the other areas of the forest. The ruins of a small stone building lie in the middle of the clearing surrounded by 4 intact columns made of black onyx.

fields.name: You are on a path in The Dead Forest.
fields.description: Here the stone-lined path narrows considerably and the density of the trees and undergrowth thickens. A large intricately-carved wooden arch, entangled with vines and covered in mystical runes, lies to the east.

fields.name: You are in a round clearing in The Dead Forest.
fields.description: This area is a wide, round clearing encircled by massive stone columns. They are chipped, cracked and weathered but still standing firm. Vines grow all around the columns. An blue orb on a stone pedestal stands in the center of the clearing.

fields.name: You are on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: This is a vast stretch of wilderness, covered by gently rolling hills and occasional patches of trees. The road stretches east and west for many miles.

fields.name: You are at the east end of a bridge on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: To the east is a massive stone bridge that spans a wide, rushing river below. The bridge is very old and covered with moss and vines. Despite its age, it seems sturdy enough. To the west, the road rolls away as far as the eye can see.

fields.name: You are at a bend on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: The road at this point seems rarely traveled and the quality of the road continues to deteriorate. The road stretches north and east for untold miles across the low, gentle hills.

fields.name: You are on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: Here the rolling hills seem to be gradually flatten out and there is a gentle descent northward into lowlands. Far to the north you can see that the terrain completely flattens out. To the south the road fades into the great distance.

fields.name: You are at the southern edge of the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: Here in this low-lying area it is muddy and damp. To the north a great marsh extends for miles. There is a very narrow path that leads into the marshlands. To the south the road leads into the wilderness.

fields.name: You are the northern edge of the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: This area lies north of a vast marsh. The stench from the marshes makes this place almost unbearable. To the north, a very old and decripit cobblestone path leads away. To the south, a mushy path leads into the marsh.

fields.name: You are on an old cobblestone path.
fields.description: Here the winding path proceeds north. In the far distance you can see a great black tower rising from the landscape. To the south you can just barely see the swamp-covered lowlands.

fields.name: You are standing before the Gate to Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: There is a great wall, made of glassy black stone and reinforced with huge iron bands, that runs east and west. To the north a great gate stands open. To the south, the path winds off into the wilderness.

fields.name: You are on the Stair of Karathas high in the Shadow Mountains.
fields.description: This stair, cracked, weathered and slippery, runs straight up and down the mountain. Traversing it is a dangerous task indeed.

fields.name: You are on the Stair of Karathas high in the Shadow Mountains.
fields.description: Here the stair precariously ascends the side of this huge mountain. Whole sections of this way are overgrown with mountain shrubbery and thorny vines that threaten your footing with each step.

fields.name: You are at the peak of a huge mountain.
fields.description: The steep, narrow mountain stair ends here at a small ledge on the sheer face of the mountain. You are very near the peak and plant life is almost nonexistent here.

fields.name: You are standing before the West Gate to Behlos City.
fields.description: Behlos City is surrounded by an high stone wall. There is a huge iron gate here with guard towers on either side. The gate, which leads east, is open allowing traffic to flow freely in and out of the city. King's Road proceeds west.

fields.name: You are standing before the South Gate to Behlos City.
fields.description: Behlos City is surrounded by an high stone wall. There is a huge iron gate here with guard towers on either side. The gate, which leads north, is open allowing traffic to flow freely in and out of the city. Westwind Road proceeds south.

fields.name: You are standing before the East Gate to Behlos City.
fields.description: Behlos City is surrounded by an high stone wall. There is a huge iron gate here with guard towers on either side. The gate, which leads west, is open allowing traffic to flow freely in and out of the city. King's Road proceeds east.

fields.name: You are standing before the North Gate to Southport City.
fields.description: This city is encircled by a huge stone wall that is heavily patrolled. Before you is a massive iron gate, flanked on either side by high towers, connected to an elaborate pulley system.

fields.name: You are in a small cave near the Gull's Eye Cliffs.
fields.description: This small natural cave has seen a lot of use by various animals and vagrants. It is littered with debris and the bones of dead creatures who died here. The cave entrance lies to the north.

fields.name: You are in long, sloping secret tunnel.
fields.description: This secret tunnel is hewn directly into the rock. Crude wooden supports barely keep the ceiling from collapsing on this very old passage. To the north you can see the cave entrance. To the south is a small chamber.

fields.name: You are in small underground chamber.
fields.description: This small chamber is structured much like the tunnel leading to it. Although it is very old, it has managed not to collapse. The chamber is very damp and water cascades down the walls. The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection on Battleforge Lane in Behlos City.
fields.description: A very nice wooden sign, adorned with the city's emblem, has arrows pointing east and west and reads, "Battleforge Lane". Another sign pointing south reads, "Dead Man's Pike".

fields.name: You are on Battleforge Lane in Behlos City.
fields.description: This area appears to be part of the low-rent district. The buildings and houses here are in a state of disrepair and are poorly maintained. Battleforge Lane runs east and west.

fields.name: You are at the east end of Battleforge Lane in Behlos City.
fields.description: This area is nothing but slums. The only exit is west.

fields.name: You are at the west end of Battleforge Lane in Behlos City.
fields.description: There are several decrepit buildings here and the denizens of this area appear to live in squalor. To the north is a small pub in a rundown shanty. A hand-written sign on the door reads, "Trollsfire Pub".

fields.name: You are on King's Road East in Behlos City.
fields.description: This is a busy, main thoroughfare that runs east and west.

fields.name: You are in the Town Square in Behlos City.
fields.description: This busy, noisy area is surrounded by shops and roads that lead away in all four directions. In the center of this large stone-paved area is huge water fountain in the center of a low pool. There are entertainers and barkers about.

fields.name: You are on N. Main St in Behlos City.
fields.description: This grand street is lined with flags and carefully trimmed trees. To the north you can see the Great Hall in which the King resides.

fields.name: You are at the North end of N. Main St in Behlos City.
fields.description: At the north end of this road stands the stately Great Hall where the king keeps his throne. A huge set of marble stairs leads up to a set of massive doors. Standing guard outside are various soldiers and knights, all regally dressed.

fields.name: You are on King's Road West in Behlos City.
fields.description: This is a busy, main thoroughfare that runs east and west. This part of town seems quite upscale featuring restaurants and shops beyond the modest means of most common folk.

fields.name: You are at a 4-way intersection in Behlos City.
fields.description: This busy intersection has a sign with arrows pointing in all four directions. King's Road runs east and west. Elm Street runs north and south.

fields.name: You are on N. Elm St. in Behlos City.
fields.description: This area appears to be the high-rent district. There are huge, stately residences lining this street along with various upscale shops. The road continues north and south.

fields.name: You are at the north end of N. Elm St. in Behlos City.
fields.description: Here the street reaches a dead end. To the north is a well-kept shop with a very nice sign, carved out of marble, bolted over the door. The sign reads, "Burly Irishman's Outfitters".

fields.name: You are on King's Road West in Behlos City.
fields.description: This is a busy, main thoroughfare that runs east and west. To the west you can see the large gate that leads out into the wilderness.

fields.name: You are on S. Elm St. in Behlos City.
fields.description: This street is lined with upscale townhouses. Fancy streetlights line the way and there are several nice grassy areas filled with people relaxing and enjoying the day. The street runs north and south. To the south you can see a busy open market.

fields.name: You are in the Open Market in Behlos City.
fields.description: This bustling area is a large round clearing in the southwest quadrant of the city. It is filled with vendors, farmers, and hawkers. The cobblestones here are very worn from years of heavy foot and wagon traffic. Streets lead away north and east.

fields.name: You are on Wyvern Blvd in Behlos City.
fields.description: This street, which runs east and west, is narrow and busy. Both sides are encroached by brick buildings that seem to stretch to the sky.

fields.name: You are at a Devil's Crossing in Behlos City.
fields.description: This area is where Main St, which runs north and south, intersects with Wyvern Blvd, which runs east and west. There are religious institutions, housed in gaudy, ornate buildings, on all four corners.

fields.name: You are on S. Main St in Behlos City.
fields.description: This nice street is lined with shops and offices for money lenders and solicitors. It runs north, to the town center, and south.

fields.name: You are on Wyvern Blvd in Behlos City.
fields.description: This street, which runs east and west, is narrow and busy. Both sides are lined by brick buildings that seem to stretch to the sky. Devil's Crossing lies to the west.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection on Cedar Lane in Behlos City.
fields.description: This area looks to be where the smelters and factories reside. It is dirty and the air is choked with debris. Cedar Lane runs north and south. Wyvern Blvd lies to the west.

fields.name: You are at the south end of Cedar Lane in Behlos City.
fields.description: There is a small cluster of shops and residences here. To the west you see a small clothing shop. A large wooden sign with colorful letters reads, "Kingsworth Clothing Shoppe".

fields.name: You are at the north end of Cedar Lane in Behlos City.
fields.description: This area is populated with more factories. It is noisy, busy, and smells terrible. All of the people walking around are clearly overworked factory employees. The smell of cooking meat wafts from the east, where you notice the Black Horse Tavern.

fields.name: You are on S. Main St in Behlos City.
fields.description: This is a busy, main thoroughfare that runs north and south. To the south you can see the large gate that leads out into the wilderness.

fields.name: You are in the Burly Irishman's Outfitters shop in Behlos City.
fields.description: This small shop smells of leather and smoke. The shop is largely spartan but several interesting old maps of faraway places adorn the walls.

fields.name: You are in the Great Hall in Behlos City.
fields.description: This massive building is where King Raulos keeps his throne. The room is lavishly furnished and lined with statues of great warriors. Tapestries on the walls depict significant events in the country's history.

fields.name: You are in the Trollsfire Pub in Behlos City.
fields.description: This dimly-lit and smoky pub doesn't seem like the type of establishment that caters to the high class. The quality of the ale seems to be quite low and the off-key singing of the drunken patrons probably doesn't make it go down any easier.

fields.name: You are in the Black Horse Tavern in Behlos City.
fields.description: This dark and smoky tavern is heavily populated by the working class. The smells of meat, ale, and stewed vegetables assail your nostrils. A lute player in the corner sings a bawdy tune about harlot from Zagora named Tamsin...

fields.name: You are on King's Road East in Behlos City.
fields.description: This is a busy, main thoroughfare that runs east and west. To the east you can see the large gate that leads out into the wilderness.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection on King's Road East in Behlos City.
fields.description: Here Dead Man's Pike, which runs north, intersects King's Road which runs east and west. There are several homeless people crowded around the corners begging for coins and food.

fields.name: You are on Dead Man's Pike in Behlos City.
fields.description: This wide street has few shops or residences. Instead, a massive gallows has been erected here for public executions. Food carts and novelty vendors sell favors for the proceedings, which are apparently quite popular.

fields.name: You are in Kingsworth Clothing Shoppe in Behlos City.
fields.description: This fancy shop contains all manner of expensive clothing items as well as swaths of various kinds of fabric. Most of this clothing is for daily wear and is not suitable for adventuring and is therefore of little interest to you.

fields.name: You are at the west end of a bridge on Old Mountain Road.
fields.description: To the west is the massive stone bridge that spans the Westsong River. The road proceeds east for a great distance.

fields.name: You are in the entryway to Fellspawn Caverns.
fields.description: It is dead quiet here and the air is absolutely still. The amount of dust that has settled indicates this area hasn't seen life in a long time. The walls and ceiling have been masterfully crafted from the natural stone.

fields.name: You are in a long, lichen-encrusted natural tunnel.
fields.description: The tunnel leads north and south sloping slightly in the latter direction. This tunnel is mostly natural with only the occasional stonework and chisel marks to indicate someone was once here before. A slighly phosphorescent lichen grows on the walls.

fields.name: You are in a small natural cavern.
fields.description: This small cavern has tunnels leading away north, east and west. There are rusty bolts protruding from the walls where sconces were once mounted, now long gone.

fields.name: You are in a long, broken natural tunnel.
fields.description: This east/west tunnel is choked with rock that has fallen in from the walls and ceiling.

fields.name: You are in a large natural cavern.
fields.description: This cavern is partially covered with dusty cobwebs. There are some stonework columns here, apparently placed to help prevent this chamber from collapsing. Tunnels lead away to the south, east and west.

fields.name: You are in a long, damp natural tunnel.
fields.description: This east/west tunnel has water cascading down in various locations. There are numerous cobwebs about.

fields.name: You are in a large natural cavern.
fields.description: This huge cavern is very cold and completely covered in cobwebs. There does not appear to be any man-made stonework here. Tunnels lead away to the west and south.

fields.name: You are in a long, lichen-encrusted natural tunnel.
fields.description: This north/south tunnel has dense patches of lichen growing in various locations. There are numerous cobwebs about.

fields.name: You are in a small natural cavern.
fields.description: This small cavern is very cold. To the east is an archway that has been carved into the natural stone. There are burned-out sconces on either side. Tunnels lead away north and south.

fields.name: You are in a long, sloping hallway.
fields.description: This east/west passage has been carefully worked into a high-ceilinged hall that slopes gently east. It is lined with extinguished sconces and empty niches. You can see numerous shards of shattered pottery about.

fields.name: You are in the Temple.
fields.description: This huge room features great stonework throughout. A small shaft cut into the south wall fills the room with light from outside the mountain. A large altar lies against the east wall. Frescoes line all four walls. A large archway leads out to the west.

fields.name: You are in a short, broken natural tunnel.
fields.description: This natural tunnel runs east and west. There are numerous chisel marks in one section of the wall as if someone (or something!) was trying to dig out a new passage.

fields.name: You are in a vast T-shaped natural cavern.
fields.description: This cavern's ceilings are so high they are almost out of sight. There is a howling sound here and you can feel a slight cool breeze. Passages lead away south, east and west.

fields.name: You are in a long, sloping natural tunnel.
fields.description: This natural tunnel winds east and west. It is quite narrow in spots making passage difficult. It slopes gently to the east.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel.
fields.description: Here there is a sharp bend in the tunnel. At the elbow are several old barrels. The tunnel runs north and east.

fields.name: You are in a long, lichen-encrusted natural tunnel.
fields.description: This tunnel is encrusted with phosphorescent lichen all over. The walls of this tunnel are lined on the east wide with skulls of various animals, humans, Dwarves, and beasts.

fields.name: You are in a long, broken natural tunnel.
fields.description: This tunnel gently slopes to the south. On the north end it is still natural and broken. As it runs south, it gradually turns into a masterfully worked hall with arched ceilings and fine columns on either side. A great archway to the south leads out.

fields.name: You are at a great T-intersection in the tunnel.
fields.description: This intersection of three hallways is massive. Great stone columns support a huge arched ceiling covered in Dwarven writing. Hallways lead out, via grand archways, to the north, south and west.

fields.name: You are in a short, lichen-encrusted natural tunnel.
fields.description: This tunnel looks to have been under construction at some point. The east end is completely worked stone showcasing the great skill of the masons who carved it. The west end is still natural rock with old wooden beams supporting sections of the tunnel.

fields.name: You are in a medium natural cavern.
fields.description: This cavern is filled with old, decrepit construction tools. They are useless now, practically dust, but were once used by Dwarven craftsmen. Natural tunnels lead away east and west.

fields.name: You are in a short, partially-collapsed natural tunnel.
fields.description: This east/west tunnel has collapsed in sections making traversal slow and treacherous. It looks as though wooden beams were added to support the ceiling, but some have buckled due to rot.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel.
fields.description: Here the tunnel makes a gradual bend, running north and east.

fields.name: You are in a short, damp natural tunnel.
fields.description: In this north/south tunnel water drips from the ceiling and walls. The floor is muddy and slick.

fields.name: You are in a medium natural cavern.
fields.description: This natural cavern features an ornately carved stone archway cut into the western wall. Dwarven writing adorns the arch. On the east wall a huge fresco has been painted onto a section that was chiseled flat. Tunnels lead out north and south.

fields.name: You are in a short, broken natural tunnel.
fields.description: This short north/south tunnel is clogged with fallen rock and dirt but is still passable.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel.
fields.description: Here the tunnel makes a gradual bend running south and east.

fields.name: You are in a long, damp natural tunnel.
fields.description: This long east/west tunnel has small puddles at various locations. There are rivulets of water that trickle from the walls feeding the puddles. Strange looking mushrooms grow all over this musty-smelling tunnel.

fields.name: You are in a long hall.
fields.description: This wide east/west hallway features fine stonework and heavy columns that support the high ceilings. Each column is carved into the shape of a tree and is carved from a type of rock that catches the light in an entrancing way.

fields.name: You are in a small, misty chamber.
fields.description: This small chamber features more quality stonework and high ceilings. The room is unnaturally warm and is completely filled with a thick mist. Archways lead away to the east and west.

fields.name: You are in a long, sloping hall.
fields.description: This gradually sloping hall, lined with columns, gradually descends westward. A mist, originating from the east, slowly rolls down the hall.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the hall.
fields.description: Here the hallway makes a sharp turn, running south and east.

fields.name: You are in a short, sloping hall.
fields.description: This gradually sloping hall, lined with columns, gradually descends southward. A thick mist slowly rolls down the hall from north to south.

fields.name: You are in a large, misty chamber.
fields.description: This humid, warm chamber is filled with mist that has settled evenly throughout. Spectacular Dwarven stonework adorns all 4 walls. A great archway leads out to the north.

fields.name: You are in a wide, column-lined hallway.
fields.description: This north/south hallway is very wide and lined with columns. There are several large cracks in the walls here that have disgorged large chunks of rock and dirt.

fields.name: You are in the ivy chamber.
fields.description: This medium-sized chamber features more impressive stonework. Cracks in the walls have allowed a curious ivy-like plant to creep in and grow all about the chamber. It nearly covers the entirety of the ceiling and walls. Archways lead north and south.

fields.name: You are in a wide, column-lined hallway.
fields.description: This wide passage runs north and south. At both ends are large archways.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection in the tunnel.
fields.description: This T-intersection features high-vaulted ceilings with archways leading out north, east, and west. On the southern wall is a niche with a fancy stonework border. A statue rests inside.

fields.name: You are in long, narrow hallway.
fields.description: This east/west hallway is quite narrow and very long. It slopes gently to the west ending in a rather low, cracked archway that seems to be on the verge of collapse.

fields.name: You are in the Hall of Records.
fields.description: This large chamber is lined with desks and drawers made of finely crafted wood that has since been disfigured or outright burned away due to high heat. Scorch marks and an ash pile in the center of the room indicate a great fire once burned here.

fields.name: You are in a long, column-lined hallway.
fields.description: This wide passage runs east and west. At both ends are large archways.

fields.name: You are in the Red Chamber.
fields.description: This huge chamber is completely painted in a deep blood-red color. The paint has not faded despite the age of this place. A statue of a stalwart Dwarven warrior stands in the center of the room. Archways lead out to the east and west.

fields.name: You are in a long hallway.
fields.description: This long hallways runs east and west. Fine stonework, some crumbling due to age, adorns the walls.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the hall.
fields.description: Here the hall makes a 90-degree bend running west and south. There is large bust, crafted of black stone, set into a niche in the north wall. The face of the bust is grotesque and contorted and shows a menacing expression.

fields.name: You are in a long, sloping hall.
fields.description: This long hall runs north and south, gently sloping in the latter direction.

fields.name: You are in the Blue Chamber.
fields.description: This large chamber is completely painted in a striking deep blue color. Although time has not been kind to these halls, the paint has not lost any of its lustre. A large set of stone stairs leads down. An archway leads out to the north.

fields.name: You are on a wide set of stone stairs.
fields.description: This wide set of stairs has a shallow rise but is very long. Many of the steps are cracked and some seem to have blown out as if by some great magical force.

fields.name: You are in a medium chamber.
fields.description: This chamber has numerous murder holes in the high ceiling and old, worthless arrows are scattered about the floor. Frescoes adorn the east and west walls. A massive iron porcullis lies to the south and a set of stairs leads up.

fields.name: You are in a wide, sloping hallway.
fields.description: This wide north/south hallway is cut completely square without any fancy stonework. The walls are heavily scarred as if a skirmish had broken out here. The hall slopes gently to the south and ends in a square stone threshold.

fields.name: You are on a narrow ledge overlooking a deep chasm.
fields.description: This rock ledge juts out from a huge chasm wall. The depth below is endless and the top of the chasm is beyond your sight. The ledge runs east and west and a threshold in the north wall leads into a hallway. Below you can see a great bridge made of stone.

fields.name: You are on the east end of a narrow ledge overlooking a deep chasm.
fields.description: Here the ledge narrows and finally comes to an end. The ledge covered with loose rock and one false step would lead to certain death. You can barely make out a great stone bridge that spans the chasm far below.

fields.name: You are on the west end of a narrow ledge overlooking a deep chasm.
fields.description: Here the ledge comes to an end. There is an old, rusted wheeled cart here that was used for transporting rock and whatever the Dwarves mined here. The peak of the stone bridge lies below, less than 50 feet.

fields.name: You are in a small finely-hewn chamber.
fields.description: This hewn chamber has been outfitted to serve as a living quarters. There is a small bed, a chest of drawers, a small kitchen area with a fire pit, a round table, and a set of chairs. The chamber smells of incense and Dwarven runes adorn the walls.

fields.name: You are on the Bridge of Lahreth.
fields.description: This is a massive stone bridge that spans a vast, dark chasm that extends down as into total darkness. The bridge is of superb Dwarven construction but seems to have been unused for a great time. The bridge runs east and west.

fields.name: You are on the Bridge of Lahreth.
fields.description: This massive bridge continues its grand arch over the depths below. To the west you can barely make out the chasm wall where the bridge lands. The bridge continues east.

fields.name: You are at the west end of the Bridge of Lahreth.
fields.description: Here the bridge lands at a small outcropping jutting out from the chasm wall. The bridge runs east, spanning a deep chasm.

fields.name: You are on the east end of the Bridge of Lahreth.
fields.description: Here the bridge joins the chasm wall, which has been carved out into a finely appointed archway leading east.

fields.name: You are at the west end of a long and narrow finely-hewn passage.
fields.description: This carefully-worked stone passage is narrow and has a low ceiling. Sconces, long since extinguished, adorn the walls. The passage runs east and west.

fields.name: You are at the east end of a long and narrow finely-hewn passage.
fields.description: On the east wall is a small wooden door that is slightly ajar. A sweet smell eminates from the chamber beyond the door. To the west the passage leads back to the archway and the bridge beyond.

fields.name: You are in a great hall filled with great stone columns.
fields.description: This magnificent hall has been carved into the natural stone. Massive columns, each a masterpiece of Dwarven craftsmanship, support a huge vaulted stone ceiling. The hall runs east and west.

fields.name: You are in the Sarcophagus Chamber.
fields.description: This enormous chamber's walls are completely covered in fine Dwarven stonework art. There are several stone sarcophagi orderly arranged about the room. There is a large dais in the center of the room.

fields.name: You are on a mucky path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: This path leads into the heart of the vast marsh that lies ahead. The water belches out a foul stench with each step you take. The path feels like you are walking on a sponge steeped in filth. The path wanders north and south.

fields.name: You are on a narrow path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this awful bog. It is quite foggy making it difficult to find your way. The path leads south and east.

fields.name: You are on a swampy path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. Far to the south you can see dry land. The path leads north and west.

fields.name: You are on a swampy path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this smelly bog. Thick fogs rolls in from all directions and swirls about you. The path leads north, south and west from here.

fields.name: You are on a winding path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. The path leads north, south and west.

fields.name: You are on a winding path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. The path leads south and east.

fields.name: You are on a narrow path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this smelly, cold, miserable bog. The path leads north, east and west.

fields.name: You are on a winding path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in awful bog. It is quiet and the very air is filled with solemn dread. The path leads north, south and west.

fields.name: You are on a mucky path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. The path ends here with your only exit back to the north.

fields.name: You are on a soggy path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this foul bog.  The sunken path becomes impassable here with your only exit back to the south.

fields.name: You are on a swampy path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this horrible, labyrinthine bog. The path leads north, south and west.

fields.name: You are on a narrow path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. The path leads north, south and west.

fields.name: You are on a mucky path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about this awful marsh. The path ends here with your only option being to turn back to the south.

fields.name: You are on a soggy path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: Time seems to have no meaning in this horrible place. The path leads north and east.

fields.name: You are on a winding path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. Far to the north you can barely make out dry land. The path leads south and west.

fields.name: You are on a mucky path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. Far to the north you can barely make out dry land. The path leads east and west.

fields.name: You are on a soggy path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. Far to the north you can barely make out dry land. The path leads north, east and west.

fields.name: You are on a winding path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. Far to the north you can barely make out dry land. The path leads south and east.

fields.name: You are on a narrow path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this labyrinthine bog. The path leads north and west.

fields.name: You are on a winding path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this dangerous, foggy, evil marsh. The path leads south and east.

fields.name: You are at a 4-way intersection in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. The path leads away in all four directions.

fields.name: You are on a swampy path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, cold, miserable bog. The path leads east and west.

fields.name: You are on a mucky path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. The path becomes too soggy here and your only option is to turn back east.

fields.name: You are at a 4-way intersection in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. It is unnaturally quiet and the very air is unsettling. The path leads away in all four directions.

fields.name: You are on a swampy path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this smelly, cold, miserable bog. The path ends here with your only option to turn back east.

fields.name: You are on a winding path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. The path leads south and west.

fields.name: You are on a swampy path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. There is a large tombstone here. The path leads north and east.

fields.name: You are on a narrow path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this confusing maze-like marsh. The path leads east and west.

fields.name: You are on a mucky path in the Foulwater Marshes.
fields.description: You are wandering about in this stinking, foggy, miserable bog. The path leads north and east.

fields.name: You are at the entrance to a small culvert.
fields.description: Inside this small culvert is a low, natural tunnel that runs north. A steady stream of foul water runs down the tunnel and out of the culvert. The running water has eroded a channel down the center of the tunnel from years of flowing.

fields.name: You are in a narrow sewer tunnel.
fields.description: Passage up this north/south natural tunnel is very difficult due to the low ceiling and narrow spots in the passage. Water running from the north makes the area damp and smelly.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection in the sewer tunnels.
fields.description: Here three sewer tunnels meet into a T-intersection. Foul water flowing from the north and west tunnels runs south to the culvert.

fields.name: You are in a narrow sewer tunnel.
fields.description: Traversing this east/west tunnel requires wading through ankle-deep water that is as foul as the leavings of a filthy orc squad.

fields.name: You are in a narrow sewer tunnel.
fields.description: This north/south tunnel smells worse than the flatulence of a hundred dragons who've just dined on a thousand buckets of Eamon Fried Chicken. Malodorous water flows from the north to the south.

fields.name: You are in a large underground chamber.
fields.description: This chamber has a large pool of foul, black water in the center. There are clay pipes protruding from the ceiling that deposit waster water into the pool. Overflow from the pool flows out of the southern tunnel. Another tunnel leads north.

fields.name: You are at the east end of a huge underground chamber.
fields.description: This huge chamber has crudely fashioned stone columns in various locations supporting the ceiling. A tunnel leads out to the south and the chamber is divided on the western wall by an enormous portcullis.

fields.name: You are in a large underground chamber.
fields.description: This large chamber has clay pipes running out of the walls and ceiling that drain into a central collecting pool. The water is beyond foul. Overflow from the pool runs down the center of the eastern tunnel. Another tunnel leads north.

fields.name: You are in a low, narrow underground passage.
fields.description: This north/south tunnel has a low ceiling and gets quite tight in spots.

fields.name: You are in a small underground chamber.
fields.description: This small natural chamber is covered in a weird, orange moss. A dank, musty smell permeates the room. Tunnels lead away to the north and south.

fields.name: You are in a low, narrow underground passage.
fields.description: This passage is quite low requiring you to stoop in order to pass. It runs north and south.

fields.name: You are at the south end of a vaulted underground chamber.
fields.description: This rather large chamber has vaulted stonework ceilings.

fields.name: You are at the north end of a vaulted underground chamber.
fields.description: This rather large chamber has vaulted stonework ceilings.

fields.name: You are in a short, low, narrow underground passage.
fields.description: This narrow passage runs east and west.

fields.name: You are at the west end of a huge underground chamber.
fields.description: This huge chamber has crudely fashioned stone columns in various locations supporting the ceiling. A tunnel leads out to the west and the chamber is divided on the eastern wall by an enormous portcullis.

fields.name: You are in a long, narrow underground passage.
fields.description: This long passage runs north and south. There are several patches of a curious orange moss on the walls and ceilings.

fields.name: You are in the well chamber.
fields.description: This chamber has a small pool, made of stone blocks, against the eastern wall. Stone passages lead into the darkness to the north, west, and south.

fields.name: You are in a long underground passage with high, vaulted ceilings.
fields.description: This crudely worked stone passage leads east and west.

fields.name: You are in the storage cellar.
fields.description: This large chamber functions as a cold storage area. It is strewn about with debris and old, rotten crates. A stone stairway leads up and a tunnel runs out to the east.

fields.name: You are in a long underground passage with high, vaulted ceilings.
fields.description: This crudely worked stone passage leads north and south.

fields.name: You are in the wine cellar.
fields.description: This chamber is filled with wooden racks. Most of them are empty. The floor is covered with shattered glass and half-broken wine bottles. There is a pungent odor of fermentation about the room. A wooden spiral staircase leads up and a tunnel leads south.

fields.name: You are in a storage room in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This medium-sized room is full of worthless junk that clutters the room. A stairway leads down and an open door leads west.

fields.name: You are in the meeting room of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room looks like it was once a meeting room but the central table has been chopped up and used as firewood. A thin layer of dust coats everything in the room. Open doors lead south and east.

fields.name: You are in the game room of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This dust-choked room looks like it was once a game room. There are tables for cards and various strategy games but the game pieces and cards are nowhere to be found. There are open doors to the north and south.

fields.name: You are in the middle of a grand hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This great hall still retains some of its former splendor despite being covered with dust and cobwebs. A fancy rug, now rotten and partially consumed by rodents, lines this grand east/west hallway. Open doors lead north and south.

fields.name: You are in the west end of a grand hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: Niches in the north and south walls hold fine works of art.

fields.name: You are in the east end of a grand hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: Niches in the north and south walls hold fine works of art. A great marble staircase leads up.

fields.name: You are in a sitting room in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room is filled with couches, chairs and tables. All of them are decrepit and the fabrics are all infested with vermin. Open doors lead north and south.

fields.name: You are in the coat room of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This simple room is lined with hangars for coats and other outer wear, however they are all empty and many of them lie on the floor. Benches surround the room. An open door leads to the north.

fields.name: You are in a sitting room in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room, once featuring exquisite appointments, is now a dusty mess. Busted furniture and tattered books are strewn about. The only exit is an open door to the north.

fields.name: You are in the middle of a grand hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This spectacular hall's walls are covered with scorch marks as if a great magical battle were fought here. Open doors lead north and south and the hall itself runs east and west.

fields.name: You are in the east end of a grand hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: The walls here are covered with scorch marks. Empty niches line the north and south walls.

fields.name: You are in the west end of a grand hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: The walls here are covered with scorch marks. Empty niches line the north and south walls. A great marble staircase leads up.

fields.name: You are in the ballroom of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This magnificent ballroom was once a place for great social occasions but no more. Tapestries which line the walls have suffered from the ravages of time and neglect. Torn banners hang from the ceiling. Open doors lead north and south.

fields.name: You are in the formal dining hall of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: A long oak table occupies the center of this room. Matching chairs lie scattered about, many broken. Any fine dinnerware that might have once sat upon this great table is long gone. Open doors lead south and west.

fields.name: You are in a storage room in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This chamber is filled with various crates and debris. All of it has been thoroughly picked over and is of little interest. An open door leads north.

fields.name: You are in a kitchen in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This large area was used for food preparation. The west wall is taken up by an enormous fireplace, its walls black from cooking roasts and stews. There is also a brick oven here, still full of blackened cinders. Open doors lead north, south and west.

fields.name: You are in a storage room in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This chamber is completely empty and only dust and cobwebs remain. An open door leads south and a wooden spiral staircase leads down.

fields.name: You are on a large stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This huge landing features fine marble flooring and exceptionally detailed woodwork throughout. A wooden spiral staircase leads up. Archways lead out to the east and west. A large set of open double doors leads south.

fields.name: You are in a grand hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: The long north/south hallway with marble floors was once used to showcase great works of art. Now it has been stripped bare. Open double doors are at the north and south ends. Great archways lead out to the east and west.

fields.name: You are in a large dining hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This enormous room was once a large dining hall suitable for large parties. Now it looks as though it has been used by bandits and raiders as a mess hall. Open double doors lead out in all four directions.

fields.name: You are in the lounge of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This elegant room was once a lounge for entertaining guests of note, foreign dignitaries and other prestigious visitors. A bar occupies the south wall. The room is lined with couches and lounge chairs, most of which have been eaten up by vermin.

fields.name: You are in a large kitchen in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This large kitchen is well-stocked with cooking utensils and other implements. Most of them are of little interest or value. On the eastern wall a large set of double doors leads out. A smaller door resides on the western wall.

fields.name: You are in a storage room in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This storage room has been picked clean. The only exit is a door the east.

fields.name: You are in a small, ornate dining hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This smaller, formal dining hall still retains some of its luxurious appointments and woodwork. A table made of expensive and rare wood stands in the middle, surrounded by haphazardly arranged chairs. Double doors exit to the east and west.

fields.name: You are at the north end of a long hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This hall ends with a wide marble staircase leading up. The hall runs to the south.

fields.name: You are in the middle of a long hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This long hallway runs north and south. There are faded portraits of various people lining the halls.

fields.name: You are at the south end of a long hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This hallways ends with doors leading south, east and west. The hallway continues to the north.

fields.name: You are in the blue bedroom in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This finely decorated bedroom has a blue motif. The bed, mostly infested with bugs, was once quite fancy but now seems more suited to firewood. A single door exits to the east.

fields.name: You are in the red bedroom in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This finely appointed bedroom has a red motif. Several nice pieces of bedroom furniture have been plundered and hacked into kindling. A single door exits to the north.

fields.name: You are in the green officer's quarters room in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This luxuriously appointed bedroom has a green motif. A single door exits to the west.

fields.name: You are in one of the guard's quarters in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room, which used to be a bedroom, has been retrofitted to act as a guard's quarters. There is a small bunk, a desk and a couple of chairs. An open door leads west back into the hall.

fields.name: You are in one of the guard's quarters in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room, which used to be a bedroom, has been retrofitted to act as a guard's quarters. There is a small bunk, a desk and a couple of chairs. An open door leads east back into the hall.

fields.name: You are at the east end of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hall leads east. Open portcullis lead north, south and west.

fields.name: You are in the middle of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hall runs east and west. Open portcullis lead north and south.

fields.name: You are at the west end of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: Open portcullis lead north and south. The hall continues to the west and an archway leads east.

fields.name: You are at the east end of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: Open portcullis lead north and south. The hall continues to the east and an archway leads west.

fields.name: You are in the middle of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hall runs east and west. Open portcullis lead north and south.

fields.name: You are at the west end of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hall leads west. Open portcullis lead north, south and east.

fields.name: You are in one of the prison cells in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room used to be a bedroom for guests of the Tower, but has been converted into a prison cell. The door has been ripped from its hinges and replaced with an iron portcullis crudely bolted into the frame.

fields.name: You are in one of the prison cells in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room used to be a bedroom for guests of the Tower, but has been converted into a prison cell. The door has been ripped from its hinges and replaced with an iron portcullis crudely bolted into the frame.

fields.name: You are in one of the prison cells in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room used to be a bedroom for guests of the Tower, but has been converted into a prison cell. The door has been ripped from its hinges and replaced with an iron portcullis crudely bolted into the frame.

fields.name: You are in one of the prison cells in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room used to be a bedroom for guests of the Tower, but has been converted into a prison cell. The door has been ripped from its hinges and replaced with an iron portcullis crudely bolted into the frame.

fields.name: You are in one of the prison cells in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room used to be a bedroom for guests of the Tower, but has been converted into a prison cell. The door has been ripped from its hinges and replaced with an iron portcullis crudely bolted into the frame.

fields.name: You are in one of the prison cells in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room used to be a bedroom for guests of the Tower, but has been converted into a prison cell. The door has been ripped from its hinges and replaced with an iron portcullis crudely bolted into the frame.

fields.name: You are in one of the prison cells in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room used to be a bedroom for guests of the Tower, but has been converted into a prison cell. The door has been ripped from its hinges and replaced with an iron portcullis crudely bolted into the frame.

fields.name: You are in one of the prison cells in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room used to be a bedroom for guests of the Tower, but has been converted into a prison cell. The door has been ripped from its hinges and replaced with an iron portcullis crudely bolted into the frame.

fields.name: You are in one of the prison cells in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room used to be a bedroom for guests of the Tower, but has been converted into a prison cell. The door has been ripped from its hinges and replaced with an iron portcullis crudely bolted into the frame.

fields.name: You are in one of the prison cells in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room used to be a bedroom for guests of the Tower, but has been converted into a prison cell. The door has been ripped from its hinges and replaced with an iron portcullis crudely bolted into the frame.

fields.name: You are in one of the prison cells in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room used to be a bedroom for guests of the Tower, but has been converted into a prison cell. The door has been ripped from its hinges and replaced with an iron portcullis crudely bolted into the frame.

fields.name: You are in one of the prison cells in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room used to be a bedroom for guests of the Tower, but has been converted into a prison cell. The door has been ripped from its hinges and replaced with an iron portcullis crudely bolted into the frame.

fields.name: You are on a small stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: From here you can go down a wide set of marble stairs or proceed west through a grand archway.

fields.name: You are on a small stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: From here you can go down a wide set of marble stairs or proceed east through a grand archway.

fields.name: You are at the top of the southeast spire of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This chamber is round and lined with open windows looking out over the wilderness below. The room is completely clean and empty. The only exit is a small door to the north.

fields.name: You are on a small stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This small stone landing has a door to the south and a narrow stairway leading down.

fields.name: You are on the southeast spire stairway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This narrow, winding stairway leads up and down a substantial distance. Long extinguished sconces line the walls. Arrow slits dot the walls along the way.

fields.name: You are on a small stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This small stone landing features a door to the north and a narrow, winding stairway that leads up.

fields.name: You are at the east end of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hallway is quite plain. A small door opens to the south. The hallway continues west.

fields.name: You are in the middle of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hallway is quite plain. An archway leads north and the hall runs east and west.

fields.name: You are at the west end of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hallway is quite plain. A small door opens to the south. The hallway continues east.

fields.name: You are on a small stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This small stone landing features a door to the north and a narrow, winding stairway that leads up.

fields.name: You are on the southwest spire stairway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This narrow, winding stairway leads up and down a substantial distance. Long extinguished sconces line the walls. Arrow slits dot the walls along the way.

fields.name: You are on a small stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This small stone landing has a door to the south and a narrow stairway leading down.

fields.name: You are at the top of the southwest spire of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This chamber is round and lined with open windows looking out over the wilderness below. The room is full of rubbsish and there are 2 messy bunks here that look like they haven't been used in ages. The only exit is a small door to the north.

fields.name: You are in a storage room in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This large chamber was once a storage area. There are wooden shelves, now rotting and falling apart, lining the walls. Several burlap sacks can be seen lying about. A door opens to the east.

fields.name: You are in a grand hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hall has huge vaulted ceilings from which tattered old banners, once colorful, now hang to rot into oblivion. Archways lead north and south. Doors open to the east and west.

fields.name: You are in a storage room in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This chamber looks to have been a storage area. There are large clay pots of varying sizes placed all about the room. A door opens to the west.

fields.name: You are on a large stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This landing leads to a wide marble stairway leading down. A great archway leads west.

fields.name: You are in an ornate vestibule in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This exquistely appointed room once showcased many great paintings. Now, only square spots remain on the walls where the valuable paintings, long since plundered, once hung. Great archways lead out in all four directions.

fields.name: You are on a large stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This landing leads to a wide marble stairway leading up. A great archway leads east.

fields.name: You are in the laboratory in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room is filled with tables, each covered with test tubes, burners, and other laboratory equipment. Everything is covered in a thin layer of dust and the room reeks. Great archways exit to the north and south. Open doors exit to the east and west.

fields.name: You are in an equipment storage room in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room is lined with wooden shelves that are slowly starting to buckle and collapse. Various lab equipment is arrayed on the few shelves that can still bear weight. Shattered glass covers the floor. A door opens to the west.

fields.name: You are in an equipment storage room in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room has been completely cleaned out and is empty. The only exit is a door to the east.

fields.name: You are in the torture chamber of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This large chamber is filled with horrific devices of torture. Great machines made of black iron are stationed about the room, ready to be pressed into service. Great archways lead out to the north and south.

fields.name: You are in a huge vestibule in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This large chamber has high vaulted ceilings and features a statue in each of the four corners. A great archway leads south. Doors open to the east and west. To the north is a large set of open double doors.

fields.name: You are in a weapon storage room in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room is arrayed with racks of rusted, useless weapons of all types. Any weapon of actual utility has long since been plundered. A door leads out to the west.

fields.name: You are in a weapon storage room of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room is arrayed with racks of rusted, useless weapons of all types. Any weapon of actual utility has long since been plundered. A door leads out to the east.

fields.name: You are in the armoury of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This chamber was used for the storage and fabrication of amour. Old tools lie scattered about. Rusty and useless coats of chain mail hang from decript racks. Suits of plate mail armor, rusted, stand ever alert. Open double doors lead north and south.

fields.name: You are in the middle of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hallway is quite plain. An archway leads south and the hall runs east and west.

fields.name: You are at the east end of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hallway is quite plain. A small door opens to the north. The hallway continues west.

fields.name: You are in the water closet in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room features a low marble bench against the east wall with a hole cut into the middle of it out of which a foul stench eminates. A tall wash basin, now dry, rests in the northwest corner. A door opens to the west.

fields.name: You are on a small stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This small stone landing features a door to the south and a narrow, winding stairway that leads up.

fields.name: You are on the northeast spire stairway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This narrow, winding stairway leads up and down a substantial distance. Long extinguished sconces line the walls. Arrow slits dot the walls along the way.

fields.name: You are on a small stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This small stone landing has a door to the north and a narrow stairway leading down.

fields.name: You are at the top of the northeast spire of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This chamber is round and lined with open windows looking out over the wilderness below. The room is completely empty. The only exit is a small door to the south.

fields.name: You are at the top of the northwest spire of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This chamber is round and lined with open windows looking out over the wilderness below. A huge crossbow, mounted on a wooden frame that is bolted to the floor, aims out one of the window. The only exit is a small door to the south.

fields.name: You are on a small stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This small stone landing has a door to the north and a narrow stairway leading down.

fields.name: You are on the northwest spire stairway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This narrow, winding stairway leads up and down a substantial distance. Long extinguished sconces line the walls. Arrow slits dot the walls along the way.

fields.name: You are on a small stairway landing in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This small stone landing features a door to the south and a narrow, winding stairway that leads up.

fields.name: You are at the west end of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hallway is quite plain. A small door opens to the north. The hallway continues east.

fields.name: You are in the garbage dump room of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room is piled waist-high with all manner of refuse and rubbish. An iron barrel in the northwest corner is filled with ashes where material was incinerated and allowed to vent out a small chimney. The only exit is a door to the east.

fields.name: You are in the altar room of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: You are in a large chamber with great stained glass windows all around. A large altar lies against the north wall. Frescoes on the walls show scenes of demonic summonings and horrific beasts from dark places beyond this world. A set of doors lies south.

fields.name: You are in the summoning room of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room has high ceilings that are painted completely black, along with the walls, which are unadorned. A pentagram has been painted on the center of the floor in white paint. Double doors exit north and south.

fields.name: You are at the north end of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hallway featured vaulted ceilings painted bright blue. Niches in the east and west walls hold valuable works of art. The hallway proceeds south and a set of double doors opens to the north.

fields.name: You are in the middle of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: A wide marble stairway leads down. The hallway runs north and south.

fields.name: You are at the south end of a hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This wide hallway featured vaulted ceilings painted bright blue. Empty niches in the south and west walls once held works of art. The hallway continues north and a large set of double doors opens to the east.

fields.name: You are in the fine art room of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This vast chamber looks like a museum. Gorgeous paintings line the walls and the middle of the floor is populated by statues and sculptures. Beautiful tapestries hang from the ceiling. Great double doors are present on the south, east and west walls.

fields.name: You are in the trophy room of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This room is covered in wood paneling and features several luxurious leather chairs. A bear rug lies in the middle of the floor and a crackling fireplace roars with a magical fire. The walls are adorned with the heads of hunted beasts. A door exits west.

fields.name: You are in a grand hall in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This great hall has colorful banners hanging from its high vaulted ceilings. A gorgeous red rug, thick and made of valuable material, covers the marble flooring here. Doors open to the north, east and west. A great archway leads south.

fields.name: You are in the reading lounge of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This cozy room is appointed with fine chairs, couches and chaise lounges. Various end tables hold small piles of books, some opened and some bookmarked. A small cart in this room is well-stocked with exotic spirits. An open door leads to the east.

fields.name: You are in the library of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This chamber is appointed with fine desks covered in expensive parchments and writing utensils. The walls are completely covered, floor to ceiling, with bookshelves - all generously stocked. An open door leads to the west.

fields.name: You are in the throne room of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This ornate room goes beyond decadence. A great throne, encrusted in jewels, sits upon a exdais situated against the south wall. Behind it, a great tapestry hangs. The room is lined with golden columns and frescoes adorn the walls. An archway leads north.

fields.name: You are in narrow secret hallway in Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This passage is quite narrow and has low ceilings. To the north, the passage ends in a secret door. At the south end is an open door.

fields.name: You are in the King's quarters of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This opulent room was clearly made for a very wealthy and powerful individual. The room is appointed with the finest furniture and luxurious blankets cover a bed made of solid gold. The only exit is a door to the north.

fields.name: You are in a small drain field.
fields.description: This muddy area is completely surrounded by high, thorny bushes that you dare not risk entanglement in. The soft ground is saturated with foul-smelling water. To the north is a small culvert from which the offending water flows.

fields.name: You are on a cobblestone path in the courtyard of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This narrow path is paved with cobblestones and lined with shrubbery. This area is the courtyard of the Tower and is completely surrounded by the Blackwall. It runs east and west.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the path in the courtyard of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: Here is a 90-degree bend in the path, running north and east. To the west you can see the great Blackwall barrier that surrounds the Tower.

fields.name: You are on a cobblestone path in the courtyard of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: Here the path runs north and south. The path runs in between the Blackwall, which lies to the west, and Grimhold's Tower to the east.

fields.name: You are on a cobblestone path in the courtyard of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: Here the path runs north and south. The path runs in between the Blackwall, which lies to the west, and Grimhold's Tower to the east. There is a small grating in the wall.

fields.name: You are on a cobblestone path in the courtyard of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: Here the path runs north and south. The path runs in between the Blackwall, which lies to the west, and Grimhold's Tower to the east.

fields.name: You are on a cobblestone path in the courtyard of Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: Here the little path becomes impassable as a thick patch of brambles and heavy vines blocks further passage. The only option is to turn back south.

fields.name: You are at the portico to Grimhold's Tower.
fields.description: This grand, covered portico marks the entrance to the Tower. Pottery fashioned into the shape of horrifically deformed animals decorates the area. To the south is the wide cobblestone road back to the Blackwall Gate. A smaller path leads off to the west.

fields.name: You are inside the Blackwall Gate.
fields.description: This is the courtyard of the great Grimhold's Tower that stands to the north. A wide, carefully paved cobblestone road leads straight to the tower's entrance. To the south lies the Blackwall Gate.

fields.name: lantern
fields.description: This simple lantern is of good quality and has a sufficient oil reservoir to provide several hours of illumination.

fields.name: rope
fields.description: This rope is of fine quality and is thick enough to support a fully-armored adventurer.

fields.name: backpack
fields.description: This brown and green backpack is of sub-par quality but large enough to hold the basic equipment needed for an extended outing.

fields.name: trail rations
fields.description: This generous assortment of nuts, dried fruits, and dried and salted meats will provide ample nutrition.

fields.name: waterskin
fields.description: This leather waterskin, used for holding water, is of mediocre quality.

fields.name: lamp oil
fields.description: You see a can of oil for use in a lantern.

fields.name: lamp oil
fields.description: You see a can of oil for use in a lantern.

fields.name: hiking boots
fields.description: These very high quality hiking boots are well-made and rugged. They are black in color with fancy buckles and reinforced soles.

fields.name: heavy coat
fields.description: This fine heavy coat is made of quality hide and stuffed with feathers and down. The craftsmanship is superb. Its green and brown color will help you blend into the wilderness.

fields.name: Beastcarver
fields.description: You see an enormous magical sword of supreme craftsmanship that was once owned by King Raulos.

fields.name: dagger
fields.description: This is an average dagger of rather poor build quality.

fields.name: cache of jewels
fields.description: You see a generous assortment of precious stones and gleaming polished jewels.

fields.name: iron door
fields.description: On the southern wall you see a huge iron door. It has a magical glow and is covered with magical wards.

fields.name: Wand of Warding
fields.description: You see a magical wand made of a thin piece of wood and tipped with some kind of clear arcane crystal. This powerful wand can be used to ward off evil spirits.

fields.name: gold coins
fields.description: You see a bag of gold coins.

fields.name: sign
fields.description: You see a wooden sign that appears to be as old as the forest itself. Partially covered in vines, it is weathered but still readable.

fields.name: orb
fields.description: The smooth, glassy blue orb is obviously magical in nature. Inside, a misty magical substance swirls about.

fields.name: pedestal
fields.description: The pedestal is made of stone carved in an ornate fashion. There is a copper plaque attached to the stone with writing on it.

fields.name: plaque
